law.catch_line: COMPLIANCE WITH FEDERAL AND STATE LAW.

section.text: The City of Raleigh will comply with the Federal Safe Drinking Water Act, the North Carolina Drinking Water Act, and North Carolina State Building Code, which pertain to cross-connections, auxiliary intakes and interconnections, and establish an effective ongoing program to control potential sources of contamination of the public water supply. (Ord. No. 1987-20, §1, 7-21-87)
